  Have: (i = 0) \/ (a_5 <= a_7).
  (* Invariant 'i_73' *)
  Have: (j = 0) \/ (a_3 <= a_6).

  Have: ((x = 0) -> ((i = 0) /\ (j = 0))).
  (* Then *)
  Have: i < a.
  (* Then *)
  Have: j < b.
}

      (forall i_1 : Z. ((0 <= i_1) -> ((i_1 < j) ->
